scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a crowned man seated on a throne, with a long beard and wearing a tunic. A woman, also crowned and wearing a headdress, stands beside him and places a crown on his head. Behind her, another figure is partially visible. The background features architectural elements resembling Gothic windows and crenellations, suggesting an interior setting within a building. The act of crowning suggests a coronation or investiture ceremony, possibly related to royalty or a significant religious figure.
